name: ColorConverter
0:
”Alexa, ask color converter to convert red zero green zero blue zero to hue saturation value”
”Alexa, ask color converter to convert hue two hundred forty saturation one hundred value ten to red green blue”
”Alexa, ask color converter to convert red twenty five green fifty blue one hundred to hue saturation value”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: color converter
des: This skill converts colors between their hex values, RGB values, and HSV values. To use this skill, tell it to convert from {format} {value} to {format}, where {format} is either red green blue, hue saturation value, or hexadecimal, and {value} is the value you want to convert.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
